name: Orthopedic Memory Foam Dog Bed
description: High-density memory foam base provides superior comfort for senior dogs or those with joint issues. Removable water-resistant cover for easy cleaning.

name: Interactive Laser Cat Toy
description: Automatic rotating laser pointer with multiple speed settings. Keeps your cat entertained and active for hours while you're away. Safe and quiet operation.

name: Self-Cleaning Litter Box
description: Advanced automatic litter box that separates waste from clean litter after every use. Odor-control carbon filters and easy-empty waste tray.

name: Adjustable Mesh Dog Harness
description: Soft and breathable reflective mesh harness for safe walking. Features a front-clip to prevent pulling and adjustable straps for a perfect fit.

name: Smart Pet Camera with Treat Dispenser
description: Wi-Fi enabled 1080p camera with night vision and two-way audio. Toss a treat to your pet from your smartphone while away. 160-degree wide angle.

name: Whisker-Friendly Ceramic Cat Bowl
description: Shallow and wide ceramic bowls designed to prevent whisker fatigue. Weighted base to prevent sliding and easy to clean glaze.

name: Natural Grain-Free Dog Treats - 1lb
description: High-protein beef and sweet potato treats baked with limited ingredients. No artificial colors or preservatives. Perfect for training and rewarding.

name: Collapsible Travel Pet Bowl
description: Food-grade silicone bowl with a carabiner for attachment to backpacks or leashes. Compact and lightweight, essential for hiking and road trips.

name: Electric Flea & Tick Comb
description: Gentle electric comb that detects and kills fleas on contact without chemicals. Safe and easy to use on both short and long-haired pets.

name: Large Aquarium Kit - 20 Gallon
description: Comprehensive fish tank set including LED lighting, power filter, and heater. Ideal for beginner and experienced hobbyists alike.

name: Pet Grooming Glove - Pair
description: Five-finger design gloves for shedding and massaging your pet. Soft silicone tips gently remove hair and dirt. Perfect for all coat types.

name: Heavy-Duty Retractable Leash - 16ft
description: Durable nylon tape leash with one-hand braking and locking system. Ergonomic handle and tangle-free design for active dogs up to 110lbs.

name: Slow Feeder Dog Bowl
description: Interactive maze design bowl that slows down eating to prevent bloating and improve digestion. Non-slip base and dishwasher-safe material.

name: Bird Playground Gym - Tabletop
description: Fun wooden parakeet and cockatiel playground with ladders, swings, and bells. Encourages physical exercise and mental stimulation for pet birds.

name: Organic Catnip Spray - 4oz
description: 100% pure organic catnip hydrosol. Spray on toys, scratching posts, and beds to encourage play and reduce stress in anxious cats.

name: Ultra-Absorbent Puppy Pads - 100pk
description: Five-layer leak-proof training pads with an integrated attractant. Quickly turns liquid into gel for easy disposal. Perfect for potty training.

name: Automatic Pet Fountain - 2L
description: Silent water fountain with a triple-filtration system. Encourages pets to drink more and keeps water fresh for days. LED indicator for low water.

name: Plush Calming Pet Bed - Small
description: Donut-shaped ultra-soft bed with raised edges to provide security and comfort. Eases anxiety and promotes better sleep for small dogs and cats.

name: Guinea Pig Wooden Settle House
description: Natural solid wood hideout and sleeping cabin for small animals. Provides a safe and cozy place for guinea pigs, hamsters, and chinchillas.

name: Pet Safety Car Seat Belt
description: Adjustable nylon belt that clicks into standard heart seat belt buckets. Keeps your pet safely restrained in the vehicle during travel.

name: Hemp Oil for Pets - Anxiety Support
description: Pure cold-pressed hemp oil formulated for pets. Helps relieve anxiety, situational stress, and joint stiffness. Easily added to food.

name: Dental Chews for Large Dogs - 30ct
description: VOHC-accepted dental treats that reduce plaque and tartar buildup while freshening breath. Nutritious and highly digestible.

name: Collapsible Soft Pet Carrier
description: Breathable mesh carrier with a padded shoulder strap for comfortable transport of cats and small dogs. Airplane approved dimensions.

name: Interactive Puzzle Ball - Treat Dispenser
description: Hard plastic ball with an inner maze that slowly releases treats as it's rolled. Mental stimulation and reward in one durable toy.

name: Natural Sisal Cat Scratching Post
description: Large sturdy post wrapped in premium sisal rope. Protects your furniture and provides a satisfying scratching surface for cats of all sizes.

name: Pet Hair Remover Brush Set
description: Double-sided reusable lint brush that easily removes pet hair from clothes, sofas, and car seats. Includes a travel-sized brush.

name: Biodegradable Poop Bags with Dispenser

name: Multi-Level Cat Tree with Scratching Posts

name: Enzymatic Stain & Odor Remover

name: Orthopedic Memory Foam Cat Bed

name: Adjustable Mesh Cat Muzzle for Grooming

name: Digital High-Precision Pet Food Scale

name: Heavy-Duty Dog Agility Tunnel - 10ft

name: Automatic Bird Seed Dispenser - No Mess

name: Pet Grooming Scissors with Safety Tips

name: Organic Hemp Seed Cat Scratching Mat

name: Smart UV Toothbrush Sanitizer for Pets
description: Compact holder that uses UVC light to eliminate 99% of bacteria on your pet's toothbrush after cleaning their teeth. Hygiene first.

name: Adjustable Mesh Pet Safety Gate - 30"

name: Natural Wood Bird Ladder - 7 Steps
description: Handcrafted from safe, non-toxic wood. provides essential exercise and vertical space for parakeet cages. attaches to wire with steel hooks.

name: Natural Bamboo Pet Toothbrush Set - 2pk

name: Smart Humidity Gauge for Large Terariums

name: Aesthetic Glass Pet Medicine Dropper Set

name: Adjustable Mesh Pet Safety Harness for Cats

description: Large solid wood container you can fill with safe soil or paper. satisfies the natural digging instinct of pet rabbits and guinea pigs.
